source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Americans donate stimulus checks to help others in need
description: Across the country, Americans are giving a gift of hope to those who need it most. They’re donating their stimulus payments to help feed their neighbors, to restaurant workers and more.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Psychiatrists start support line for doctors fighting coronavirus
description: A group of psychiatrists launched the Physician Support Line to help doctors deal with the stress of combating the coronavirus crisis, with more than 600 people now volunteering in shifts to help.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Biden accuser Tara Reade says she’s unsure of wording used in complaint
description: Former Senate staffer Tara Reade, who alleges Joe Biden sexually assaulted her while he was a senator, reiterated to NBC News that she’s not sure what words she might have used in the 27-year-old complaint that she says was filed. Reade said it was regarding …
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Coronavirus: U.S. saw its deadliest 24 hours last week
description: The U.S. marked its deadliest 24 hours last week with more than 2,900 lives lost to COVID-19, according to new data from the World Health Organization. Former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb warns that the virus continues its persistent spread outside of the …
source.name: NBC News

author: Allan Smith
title: Birx says protesters not practicing social distancing are 'devastatingly worrisome'
description: Dr. Deborah Birx, the White House coronavirus response coordinator, said Sunday that anti-lockdown protesters who don't social distance could contract the illness and pass it on to others.
content: Dr. Deborah Birx, the White House coronavirus response coordinator, said Sunday that anti-lockdown protests are "devastatingly worrisome" because demonstrators who do not practice social distancing measures could contract the illness and pass it on to others … [+6757 chars]
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Pompeo says ‘evidence’ ties coronavirus to Chinese lab
description: President Trump was pressed to explain what evidence ties the coronavirus pandemic back to the Chinese lab, but said “I’m not allowed to tell you that.” The Director of National Intelligence says the virus was not man-made or genetically modified.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: More than half of the U.S. will be at least partially reopened by Monday
description: By Monday, 32 states will be at least partially open for business with more set to join in the next week. Calls to reopen are growing louder with demonstrations taking place across the country.
source.name: NBC News
